author: Nicole Wetsman
title: Doulas in New York City are preparing to go digital
description: Two New York hospital systems are banning everyone except the pregnant person from the delivery room as the number of COVID-19 cases in the city spike. Doulas are turning to FaceTime and Zoom to support people in labor.
content:
Hospitals are barring everyone from delivery rooms
Photo by BSIP / UIG via Getty Images
Two New York City hospital systems are barring anyone except the person in labor from the delivery room, including spouses, partners, and family members. People giving b… [+5644 chars]
